metadata.name: Cyclical-1
metadata.description:
Where is the beginning… where is the end…					
Within life, we do not diminish, we do not increase… we just relocate… transform … renew…					
The only changing entity… time?					
Is a human life a whole thing that will repeat the same way from the beginning to the end?					
Where do “lives” overlap and crisscross in this cycle?					
Can we notice at what point we are in the cycle?					
Do we respect this cyclical nature of life enough?					
Can we show “the endless moment” in a photograph?					
I created this photo project to explore these questionings.					
Giving a cyclical format to experienced moments, I made the concept of time vanish…					
I want to the viewer to notice all their life  and the time, and question it inside the black and white circles I have created looking at the lives inside them…					
The stories I narrated have no beginning and no end.				
With the magical power of the  “photograph”,  I managed to see the cycle, and to show it.
